sentences.sentence: But the people sanctioned must mind.
sentences.translation: 但是也必须要虑及被制裁方的感受。

sentences.sentence: It was the third officially-sanctioned attempt to do so in 30 years.
sentences.translation: 这是他30年内第三次正式认可的对这项研究的发表。

sentences.sentence: One was the new category of recreational aircraft the FAA sanctioned in 2004.
sentences.translation: 其中一个是联邦航空管理局在2004年批准的新型娱乐性飞行器。
